meanings.definition: The bony ridge above the eye sockets.
meanings.sent1: Her browbones framed her eyes beautifully.
meanings.sent2: He gently touched his browbones to feel the shape of his face.
meanings.sent3: The sunglasses sat perched on her browbones like a tiny roof.
meanings.sent4: His determination was etched into his browbones, visible to all.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight cast a shadow under her browbones, creating a mysterious look.

meanings.definition: The prominent bones that form the upper part of the eye sockets.
meanings.sent1: The model's high cheekbones accentuated her browbones.
meanings.sent2: He felt a slight ache in his browbones after a long day of work.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that his browbones were his 'eye umbrellas'.
meanings.sent4: Her browbones were like two protective shields guarding her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted delicate lines to highlight the curve of her browbones.
